title: My PayPal is blocked, will Amazon Kindle program pay me directly in my bank account after publishing my ebook? - Quora

response.answer_text: Amazon does not work with PayPal. You need a bank account in the USA, UK, Canada, or Australia. If you do not live in any of those countries, you can get an acceptable virtual USA bank account with Payoneer. Here’s my affiliate link: https://valwaldeck.com/payoneer. If you sign up with my affiliate link, we both get a reward of $25 once you earn $1000 in commissions. Payoneer is a trusted company and thousands of non-USA citizens use their facility to earn commission from Amazon and other online sellers.
